content: आक्रंदः {@--1@} Weeping, crying out; किं क्रंदसि दुराक्रंद <ls>Pt. 4. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Calling, invoking, calling out to; <ls>Ms. 8. 292.</ls> {@--3@} Sound, war-cry, a cry (in general); आक्रंद उदभूत्तत्र <ls>Ks. 10 94.</ls> {@--4@} A friend, defender. {@--5@} A brother. {@--6@} A fierce or violent combat, war, battle. {@--7@} A place of crying. {@--8@} A king who prevents an ally from aiding another; a king whose kingdom lies next but one; प्रार्ष्णिग्राहं च संप्रेक्ष्य तथाक्रंदं च मंडले <ls>Ms. 7. 207</ls> (see <ls>Kull.</ls> thereon).
